cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zenbu

sentence.kanji: それ、全部ください。
sentence.romaji: sore zenbu kudasai
sentence.english: I'd like all of those, please.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heya

sentence.kanji: 私の部屋は2階にあります。
sentence.romaji: watashi no heya ha nikai ni arimasu
sentence.english: My room is on the second floor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kekon

sentence.kanji: 彼女は来月結婚します。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha raigetsu kekon shimasu
sentence.english: She's getting married next month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikui

sentence.kanji: 彼は背が低い。
sentence.romaji: kare ha se ga hikui
sentence.english: He's short.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kami

sentence.kanji: 紙と鉛筆はありますか。
sentence.romaji: kami to enpitsu ha arimasu ka
sentence.english: Do you have paper and pencil?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuubinyasan

sentence.kanji: 郵便屋さんはもう来ましたか。
sentence.romaji: yuubinyasan ha mou kimashita ka
sentence.english: Has the postman already come?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimei

sentence.kanji: ここに住所と氏名を書いてください。
sentence.romaji: koko ni juusho to shimei wo kaite kudasai
sentence.english: Please write your name and address here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toshi

sentence.kanji: 東京は日本一大きな都市です。
sentence.romaji: toukyou ha nihonichi ooki na toshi desu
sentence.english: Tokyo is the largest city in Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsugou

sentence.kanji: 今日は都合が悪くて行けません。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha tsugou ga warukute ikemasen
sentence.english: I can't go today because it's not convenient for me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuubin

sentence.kanji: さっき郵便が届きました。
sentence.romaji: saki yuubin ga todokimashita
sentence.english: The mail has just arrived.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bubun

sentence.kanji: この部分は問題ないです。
sentence.romaji: kono bubun ha mondai nai desu
sentence.english: There's no problem with this part.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuubinkyoku

sentence.kanji: 郵便局で切手を買いました。
sentence.romaji: yuubinkyokude kite wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought a stamp at the post office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tegami

sentence.kanji: 友人から手紙をもらいました。
sentence.romaji: yuujin kara tegami wo moraimashita
sentence.english: I got a letter from a friend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichibu

sentence.kanji: 計画を一部変更しましょう。
sentence.romaji: keikaku wo ichibu henkou shimashou
sentence.english: Let's change part of the plan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimin

sentence.kanji: 市民の安全は大切だ。
sentence.romaji: shimin no anzen ha taisetsu da
sentence.english: The citizens' safety is important.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouho

sentence.kanji: 会長の候補は3人います。
sentence.romaji: kaichou no kouho ha sannin imasu
sentence.english: There are three candidates for chairman.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuto

sentence.kanji: 東京は日本の首都です。
sentence.romaji: toukyou ha nipon no shuto desu
sentence.english: Tokyo is the capital of Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taiho

sentence.kanji: 逃げていた犯人が逮捕されました。
sentence.romaji: nigete ita hannin ga taiho saremashita
sentence.english: They arrested that criminal who escaped.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eikyou

sentence.kanji: 私は彼から大きな影響を受けました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kare kara ooki na eikyou wo ukemashita
sentence.english: I was deeply influenced by him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rikon

sentence.kanji: 友人が離婚しました。
sentence.romaji: yuujin ga rikon shimashita
sentence.english: My friend got divorced.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juumin

sentence.kanji: 地域の住民が集まって話合いをした。
sentence.romaji: chiiki no juumin ga atsumate hanashiai wo shita
sentence.english: The local residents got together and talked.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nemui

sentence.kanji: 今日はとても眠いです。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha totemo nemui desu
sentence.english: I'm very sleepy today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nemuru

sentence.kanji: 昨日は8時間眠りました。
sentence.romaji: kinou ha hachijikan nemurimashita
sentence.english: I slept for eight hours yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taitei

sentence.kanji: 朝食は大抵7時頃に食べます。
sentence.romaji: choushoku ha taitei shichijigoro ni tabemasu
sentence.english: I usually eat breakfast around seven o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rouka

sentence.kanji: 廊下は走らないでください。
sentence.romaji: rouka ha hashiranai de kudasai
sentence.english: Don't run in the hallway.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miyako

sentence.kanji: ミラノはファッションの都です。
sentence.romaji: mirano ha fuashon no miyako desu
sentence.english: Milan is the capital of fashion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teika

sentence.kanji: 最近、教育レベルが低下しています。
sentence.romaji: saikin kyouiku reberu ga teika shite imasu
sentence.english: Recently, education levels are decreasing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shi

sentence.kanji: 会長は田中氏に決定。
sentence.romaji: kaichou ha tanakashi ni ketei
sentence.english: It has been decided that Mr. Tanaka will be chairman.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youshi

sentence.kanji: この用紙に名前を書いてください。
sentence.romaji: kono youshi ni namae wo kaite kudasai
sentence.english: Please write your name on this form.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hyoushi

sentence.kanji: その人気アイドルが今月の表紙だよ。
sentence.romaji: sono ninki aidoru ga kongetsu no hyoushi da yo
sentence.english: The popular star is on the cover this month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakushi

sentence.kanji: テストを白紙で出したの。
sentence.romaji: tesuto wo hakushi de dashita no
sentence.english: I handed in my test answer sheet completely blank.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakubu

sentence.kanji: 彼は経済学部の学生です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha keizai gakubu no gakusei desu
sentence.english: He is a student in the Department of Economics.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toshin

sentence.kanji: 彼は都心に住んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha toshin ni sunde imasu
sentence.english: He lives downtown.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokai

sentence.kanji: 彼は都会での生活を楽しんでいるの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha tokai de no seikatsu wo tanoshinde iru no
sentence.english: He's enjoying city life.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hougakubu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は法学部の学生です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha hougakubu no gakusei desu
sentence.english: She's a student in the Law Department.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tei

sentence.kanji: 彼は低賃金で働いているんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha teichingin de hataraite iru n da
sentence.english: He's working for a low wage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's konyaku

sentence.kanji: 二人は婚約しています。
sentence.romaji: futari ha konyaku shite imasu
sentence.english: They are engaged.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mikon

sentence.kanji: 彼はまだ未婚です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mada mikon desu
sentence.english: He's still single.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokumin

sentence.kanji: 国民の安全が最も大切です。
sentence.romaji: kokumin no anzen ga motomo taisetsu desu
sentence.english: Citizen safety is most important.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's minshu

sentence.kanji: 民主主義について勉強しました。
sentence.romaji: minshushugi ni tsuite benkyou shimashita
sentence.english: We studied democracy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toritsu

sentence.kanji: ここは都立の病院です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha toritsu no byouin desu
sentence.english: This is a metropolitan hospital.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teion

sentence.kanji: この製品は低温で保存してください。
sentence.romaji: kono seihin ha teion de hozon shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please store this product at a low temperature.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naibu

sentence.kanji: これは機械の内部の問題です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha kikai no naibu no mondai desu
sentence.english: This is a problem with the internal parts of the machine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saitei

sentence.kanji: これは今までで最低の記録だ。
sentence.romaji: kore ha ima made de saitei no kiroku da
sentence.english: This is the worst record so far.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jinmin

sentence.kanji: 彼は人民のための政治を行った。
sentence.romaji: kare ha jinmin no tame no seiji wo okonata
sentence.english: He engaged in politics for the people's benefit.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oginau

sentence.kanji: 夏は水分を十分に補いましょう。
sentence.romaji: natsu ha suibun wo juubun ni oginaimashou
sentence.english: Make sure you take enough liquids in the summer.

cards.english: in the metropolitan area of Tokyo
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tonai

sentence.kanji: 彼の職場は都内にあります。
sentence.romaji: kare no shokuba ha tonai ni arimasu
sentence.english: His office is in the Tokyo metropolitan area.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's to

sentence.kanji: 彼女は都の職員です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha to no shokuin desu
sentence.english: She's an official of the metropolitan government.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's buhin

sentence.kanji: 車の部品を取り替えたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kuruma no buhin wo torikaeta n da
sentence.english: I changed some parts of the car.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukamaru

sentence.kanji: 彼女はついに捕まりました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha tsuini tsukamarimashita
sentence.english: She was finally caught.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaibu

sentence.kanji: これは外部には秘密です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha gaibu ni ha himitsu desu
sentence.english: This is confidential.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honbu

sentence.kanji: その事件の直後、捜査本部が設置された。
sentence.romaji: sono jiken no chokugo sousa honbu ga sechi sareta
sentence.english: Immediately after the incident, investigation headquarters were set up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's buka

sentence.kanji: 彼は優秀な部下を持っているわね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yuushuu na buka wo mote iru wa ne
sentence.english: He has outstanding people working for him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinkon

sentence.kanji: 妹夫婦は新婚です。
sentence.romaji: imoutofuufu ha shinkon desu
sentence.english: My younger sister and her husband are the newlyweds.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bumon

sentence.kanji: あの歌手は3部門で賞を取ったの。
sentence.romaji: ano kashu ha 3 bumon de shou wo tota no
sentence.english: That singer took the prize in three categories.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanbu

sentence.kanji: あの会社の幹部は皆とても優秀だね。
sentence.romaji: ano kaisha no kanbu ha minna totemo yuushuu da ne
sentence.english: That company's executives are all exceptional people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokuminchi

sentence.kanji: この国はイギリスの植民地でした。
sentence.romaji: kono kuni ha igirisu no shokuminchi deshita
sentence.english: This country was a colony of Britain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kougakubu

sentence.kanji: 彼は工学部の教授です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kougakubu no kyouju desu
sentence.english: He is a professor in the Department of Engineering.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hibiku

sentence.kanji: 彼の声はよく響きます。
sentence.romaji: kare no koe ha yoku hibikimasu
sentence.english: His voice carries well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's minzoku

sentence.kanji: 私は民族の歴史に興味があります。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha minzoku no rekishi ni kyoumi ga arimasu
sentence.english: I'm interested in the history of ethnic groups.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teteiteki

sentence.kanji: 部屋の中を徹底的に探しました。
sentence.romaji: heya no naka wo teteiteki ni sagashimashita
sentence.english: I searched inside the room thoroughly.

cards.english: after all, in the long run
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toutei

sentence.kanji: 今夜中に東京に着くのは到底無理でしょう。
sentence.romaji: konyajuu ni toukyou ni tsuku no ha toutei muri deshou
sentence.english: We can't possibly arrive in Tokyo tonight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teikou

sentence.kanji: 犯人は警察に抵抗したの。
sentence.romaji: hannin ha keisatsu ni teikou shita no
sentence.english: The criminal resisted the police.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soko

sentence.kanji: コップの底が濡れていますよ。
sentence.romaji: kopu no soko ga nurete imasu yo
sentence.english: The bottom of the glass is wet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daibubun

sentence.kanji: 絵の大部分が水に濡れてしまったな。
sentence.romaji: e no daibubun ga mizu ni nurete shimata na
sentence.english: A large portion of picture got wet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gun

sentence.kanji: この郡は来年、市になりますよ。
sentence.romaji: kono gun ha rainen shi ni narimasu yo
sentence.english: This county will turn into a city next year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsutsumigami

sentence.kanji: 包み紙はたたんでください。
sentence.romaji: tsutsumigami ha tatande kudasai
sentence.english: Please fold the wrapping paper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's inemuri

sentence.kanji: 彼はソファーで居眠りをしているよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sofua- de inemuri wo shite iru yo
sentence.english: He is dozing on the sofa.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nemutai

sentence.kanji: まだ8時なのに、もう眠たいです。
sentence.romaji: mada 8 ji na no ni mou nemutai desu
sentence.english: I'm already sleepy even though it is only eight o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nemuri

sentence.kanji: 彼女はいつもより早く眠りに着いたよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha itsumo yori hayaku nemuri ni tsuita yo
sentence.english: She fell asleep quicker than usual.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suimin

sentence.kanji: 1日7時間は睡眠を取るようにしています。
sentence.romaji: ichinichi shichijikan ha suimin wo toru you ni shite imasu
sentence.english: I try to sleep for seven hours a day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichibubun

sentence.kanji: 僕が知っているのは一部分に過ぎない。
sentence.romaji: boku ga shite iru no ha ichibubun ni suginai
sentence.english: What I know is only a portion of it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genkouyoushi

sentence.kanji: 作文を書くのに原稿用紙を使ったの。
sentence.romaji: sakubun wo kaku no ni genkouyoushi wo tsukata no
sentence.english: I used writing paper to write my composition on.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's minkan

sentence.kanji: その土地は民間企業に売却されたんだ。
sentence.romaji: sono tochi ha minkan kigyou ni baikyaku sareta n da
sentence.english: The land was sold off to a private company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tochou

sentence.kanji: あの高い建物が都庁です。
sentence.romaji: ano takai tatemono ga tochou desu
sentence.english: That tall building is Tokyo Metropolitan City Hall.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kougai

sentence.kanji: 私は郊外に家を買いました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kougai ni ie wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought a house in the suburbs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinkou

sentence.kanji: 彼らは東京近郊に住んでいる。
sentence.romaji: karera ha toukyou kinkou ni sunde iru
sentence.english: They live on the outskirts of Tokyo.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokyou

sentence.kanji: 彼女は久しぶりに故郷に帰りました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha hisashiburi ni kokyou ni kaerimashita
sentence.english: She returned to her hometown after a long time away.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukamaeru

sentence.kanji: 少年は網でその蝶を捕まえた。
sentence.romaji: shounen ha ami de sono chou wo tsukamaeta
sentence.english: The boy captured the butterfly with the net.
